content.rendered:
Would you like the opportunity to have a 1-hour health consult with me?

I’m doing a very special giveaway for supporting your local bookstore! 

If you head over to your local bookstore and take a picture with my new book, Food: What the Heck Should I Cook? you can enter in a chance to with a one-on-one Zoom wellness consult with ME!

During this wellness consult, I will give you lifestyle and diet recommendations based on your personal goals.

I’m so passionate about supporting local business, and I’m also passionate about getting my readers healthy, that I thought this was the perfect way to encourage both. 

Here’s how to enter this giveaway:

  1. Snap a selfie with Food: What the Heck Should I Cook? at your local bookstore. 
  2. Post your selfie to Instagram, Facebook, or Twitter using the following hashtags:
    #foodthecookbook, #vitamix, and #cindergrill
  3. Submit all entries by October 29th at midnight PST. I extended the deadline per your requests! 

That’s it! Super easy.

For a bonus entry, make one of my recipes from the book and post it on Instagram using the same hashtags (#cindergrill, #CookwithVitamix, #Foodthecookbook) plus the recipe name, by October 29th at midnight PST.

We will randomly select 8 photos to win one of these amazing giveaways:

A One-Hour Personal Wellness Consult with Me—Through a wellness consult, I  will give you lifestyle and diet recommendations based on your personal goals, designed for your individual health needs. This is an amazing step for understanding realistic action items that will take your health to a new level.

Vitamix ($399 value, 5 will be given away)—my favorite blender and a device I use almost every day (it works great for my Ultimate Mint Chocolate Shake found on page 93 of Food: What the Heck Should I Cook?). Vitamix makes some of the most powerful blenders you can find, is trusted by chefs and professionals, and makes it easy to create delicious food regardless of skill level.

Cinder Grill ($429 value, 3 will be given away)—the world’s first precision grill. You place your food on it, set the temperature you want your food to cook to, and walk away. Cinder will cook it to that exact temperature without even using a temperature probe. It doesn’t get much easier than that.

Support your local bookstore today and cook your way to optimal health! I can’t wait to see you on social.

P.S. You will also be entered to win a Vitamix or a Cindergrill.

P.P.S. No purchase necessary to enter or win.
